attributes.action: cost of thorpe park and alton towers less!!!! DECREASE THE COST OF THORPE PARK and have more fun
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want the cost of thorpe park to decrease and more people will have fun ranging from tourists to little 7 year olds. !!! SIGN, so we can have more fun for less!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
